body.name: Modern Innovations 4-Cup Nonstick Egg Frying Pan with Lid, Fried Egg Pan, Omelette Pan, Mini Pancake Pan for Stove Top Gas & Electric, Small Egg Skillet, Breakfast Sandwich Maker

features: Perfect Eggs Every Time: The nonstick coating on our 4 egg frying pan creates an easy release to prevent eggs from sticking. We’ve also included a silicone spatula to make removing your eggs even easier.
Heavy Duty: Made of premium aluminum alloy, our egg skillet nonstick comes equipped with a stay-cool handle for easy maneuvering. The clear glass lid allows you to watch your eggs as they cook.

Time Saver: Our egg pan with lid has superior heat retention to cook eggs in less time. Use low flame to prevent hot spots and overcooking. Gas and electric stove top compatible. *Do not use on induction.
Easy to Clean: The coating on our nonstick egg pan makes clean-up a breeze. All you have to do is wash with soap, warm water and a sponge. Hand wash only. *Not dishwasher safe.
Versatile: Use our 4 compartment skillet to enjoy an eggcellent breakfast every morning. Great for fried eggs, mini pancakes, egg sandwiches, omlette bites, bacon, sausage patties, and more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make Breakfast Easy Modern Innovations Egg Frying Pan Designed with 4 egg molds, our pan cooks 4x as much as the average egg skillet. The high heat retention cooks eggs in only 3 minutes. This saves you time and cooking space. The clear glass top makes it easy to keep an eye on your eggs. We've also included a silicone spatula so you can easily serve directly from the pan onto your plate. From colorful veggie egg bites to savory egg sandwiches, our frying pan with lid can be used to cook all kinds of creative breakfast dishes.
Previous page Next page 1 Super Time Saver 2 Heat Retention 3 Non-Stick Surface 4 Clear Glass Lid 5 Eggstraodinary!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pan for pancakes!
reviews.reviewText: Heats quickly...using it for silver dollar pancakes....great product, arrive quickly n packaged nicely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's not as heavy as one might expect from a $24 pan.
reviews.reviewText: It's too lightweight. The indents are too shallow. It doesn't sit well on my burners because the bottom isn't flat. Not a good value at $24.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The 4-cup design allows for simultaneous cooking of multiple eggs or other small portions, making it an ideal solution for busy mornings or when cooking for a small group. The nonstick surface lives up to its promise, ensuring that eggs slide effortlessly onto the plate without any sticking, and making cleanup a breeze. The included lid is a fantastic addition, as it helps to trap heat and steam, allowing for even cooking and perfectly fluffy omelettes. I also found it incredibly useful for melting cheese on top of eggs or for creating perfectly round mini pancakes. The pan's construction is solid and durable, and it works seamlessly on gas and electric stovetops, providing consistent heat distribution for precise and efficient cooking. The compact size makes it easy to store, and the handle remains cool to the touch, ensuring safe and comfortable handling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The screw and washer were missing to attach knob to lid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just right for 2
reviews.reviewText: We like it. It's just my wife and I and one pancake and one egg is all we need to satisfy us for breakfast. Easy to clean too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I've used it to make pancakes, Korean vegetable pancakes, fried eggs, omelette like eggs with veggies, and sausages. Everything comes out great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars best pan for eggs and others but lid melts with heat
reviews.reviewText: To supplier I suggest if you supply a quality lid, this can be a 5 stars...*****

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and works perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: Having a bunch of chickens we make a LOT of eggs and egg sandwiches. As such we have tried many “egg pans” and so far this one is very much meeting expectations. Feels good quality actually a lot lighter than I thought. It was very easy to assemble.-The handles are not metal so pretty much cool touch.-The pan itself is about half as thick as our normal pans. This may lead to warping later but hopefully not.-The bottom is raised on the outside in the egg spots so it sits directly on the burner.-Heat dissipation is really good, everything cooked evenly.So far it is extremely non-stick and releases the eggs perfectly. For the price this thing is amazing!
